channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car parked on pedestrian walkway, 19th July
item.description:
Parking in Blondin Way has designated bays, this car is parked on the pedestrian path, sticking out into the corner of the road which makes it harder for cars going around the corner, and fully blocks the path for pedestrians. This has been going on for at least a month.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattress, 19th July
item.description:
Mattress dumped on road by station approach
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Delafield Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering , 37 londesborough road, 19th July
item.description:
Someone dumped trash in front of our flat yesterday. It was open by foxes and there is now trash all over the pavement and road ( smell is awful )
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Londesborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brickwork needs to be checked - mortar loose, 19th July
item.description:
The entry to the park has two brick pillars that support the gates - there is severe cracking on the right hand post from entry from the Village away side - needs to be looked and some more cement/mortar added to make it stable - not sure which department is responsible for this area of the park

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 152, Village Way, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Estate agent for sale signs on grass verge, 19th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxgrove Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Dog fouling, 19th July
item.description:
There's so much dog Fesies around the building, mostly seen on the grass surrounding the buildings (bellow residents windows) causing awful smell not to mention the serious health Risk to adults and especially to the children. Issue has been present for 3years +

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodhurst Road, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Cricklewood Broadway dirty and trash on pavement, 19th July
item.description:
A sofa has been abandoned on the pavement, possibly dumped by tenants living nearby. The pavement is also consistently dirty and appears never to have been properly cleaned with machinery

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cricklewood Broadway, London
Report on FixMyStreet
